story_text: Cathy the cat chased a colorful butterfly across the garden.
Carl the crab collected colorful shells by the calm sea.
story_images: A cat named Cathy running after a butterfly in a vibrant garden with flowers around.
A crab named Carl picking up shiny, colorful shells on a sandy beach by a tranquil sea.

questions.question: What did Cathy the cat chase?
Where did Carl the crab collect shells?
